questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP -
An organization implements Dynamics 365 Finance.
You need to determine where work items originate.
From which module do the following work items originate? To answer, drag the appropriate modules to the correct work items. Each module may be used once, more than once, or not at all. You may need to drag the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Select and Place:
//IMG//

HOTSPOT -
You are tasked with enhancing usability in the Dynamics 365 Finance deployment for an organization.
The organization is evaluating different approaches, including using workspaces.
You need to identify the goals of using workspaces.
Which goals should you identify? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Hot Area:
//IMG//

choices.C: There is a filter on the grid.
choices.B: The user does not have the proper permissions.
choices.D: The user is in the wrong environment.
choices.A: The sales order was not created.

questions.question_text:
You need to determine the root cause for the regional manager's issue.
What is the root cause?

HOTSPOT -
You need to configure integration with Excel.
How should you complete the configuration? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Hot Area:
//IMG//

choices.C: Vendor Score Cards and Power Automate
choices.A: Document Management Notes and Power Automate

discussion.content:
Question has 2 parts, 1st one is regarding workflow to streamline the feedback and can achieved with Workflows. 2nd one is about customer history of of vendor direct delivery performance must be documented to assure.... Second one can only be achieved if there is an system of record recording these issues & resolution and this is where Case Management will support.
So the logical answer would be D - Case Management and Workflow

comments.content: Case management is not an option because the resolution is offline and it is at the discretion of the regional managers.
Agreed, no Vendor ScoreCard in D365 rather Vendor Evaluation in Procurement

discussion.content:
Vendor Score Cards does not exist in D365.
I think is D

questions.question_text:
You need to configure the system to meet the workflow requirements.
What should you use?
